page.title: 09Clubs,Abermorddu& District
page.content: {Brownies:}Abermorddu Brownies were formed in 1969 since when there have been a number of Brown Owls (leaders). The present Brown Owl is Mrs.Ann Griffiths. The Abermorddu Brownies consist of a pack of 24 girls between the ages of 7 and 10 who are organised into four sixes called Imps,Elves, Gnomes and Pixies. In each six there are a sixer, a second and four others. Brown Owls assistant, Tawny Owl, is Mrs.Edwards. Once a Brownie has said her promise, she pays 30p a week to attend the weekly sessions (held at Abermorddu School from 6:30 to 8 p.m. on Wednesdays). At these there are games to play, things to make and a variaty of badges to be gained.Occasionally they go on trips. At the age of ten, many Brownies leave to join Guides.
